main event: An unidentified flying object was reported near Camp Pendleton, California on December 11, 1955, observed for over an hour with flashing lights.
interesting points: The object had flashing green, yellow, and white lights and was stationary for about 10-15 minutes before slowly vanishing to the east., The object was observed through a periscope, appearing brighter than stars., Witness description noted the object's color as brilliant greenish-bluish and noted its size appeared like a hair when viewed with the naked eye., Source was a civilian Forest Ranger who observed the object for approximately one hour., Investigations showed no balloons or aircraft in the area at the time of sighting.
witness description: civilian Forest Ranger, age 38, with previous Navy service
